creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: vertical composition with four shallow shadow boxes on top of one another, each backed with cardboard, manila file folders and corrugated cardboard, with brightly-painted wavy vertical lines; face with closed eyes and open mouth in ULC; rows of figures with long arms upraised in bottom two shadow boxes
image_copyright: Copyrighted © Purvis Young. All rights reserved.
medium: Pigments on paper, collaged on manila file folders and corrugated cardboard, mounted on wood
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
signed: LRC of third shadow box from top, in purple: Young
title: Untitled (Celebration)
